metadata.title: CVE-2022-39333 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Nexcloud desktop is the Desktop sync client for Nextcloud. An attacker caninject arbitrary HyperText Markup Language into the Desktop Clientapplication. It is recommended that the Nextcloud Desktop client isupgraded to 3.6.1. There are no known workarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
